meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wacky or eccentric.
meanings.sent1: Her wackinesses always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of wackinesses, from the decorations to the games.
meanings.sent3: The wackinesses of his outfit made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: In a world of seriousness, her wackinesses shone like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The wackinesses of the comedy show left the audience in stitches.

meanings.definition: Instances of behavior or ideas that are unconventional or zany.
meanings.sent1: The movie was filled with wackinesses that kept the audience entertained.
meanings.sent2: Their friendship was built on shared wackinesses and inside jokes.
meanings.sent3: The wackinesses of the science experiment made everyone curious.
meanings.sent4: His wackinesses were like a breath of fresh air in the stuffy office.
meanings.sent5: The wackinesses of the art installation challenged traditional norms.
